Author: mushroomsandyoga
Text: Your friend is probably right. I’ve always been a heavy sleeper but especially when I’m at a low weight and restricting. Im relapsing now but A year ago I decided to weight restore and I started to sleep 2 hours less every night and was like woah I have energy. My BF was like “of course, it’s because you’re not starving yourself anymore” and I was like ooooo Mind blown.
